_meanings:
{@--4@} That which holds
or contains, a vessel, recipient.

{@--6@} A basin round the foot of a tree;
{#ADArabaMDapramuKEH prayatnEH#} <ls>R. 5. 6.</ls>

{@--9@} The sense of the locative case,
location, comprehension;  
{#ADAro'DikaraRaM#}; ({#ADAra#} is of {3} kinds:  
{#--OpaSlezika, vEzayika#}, and {#aBivyApaka#} see <ls>Sk.</ls> on 
<ls>P. I. 4. 45</ls>).

the influence, relation, or
action of the support or recipient
upon the thing received or 
supported; <ls>H. 3. 12.</ls>
